channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Maven Repository Server Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Maven Repository Server Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-35144|2023-10-24T12:50:37.462Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20maven%20repository%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Maven Repository Server Plugin 1.10 and earlier does not escape project and build display names on the Build Artifacts As Maven Repository page, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-35143|2023-10-24T12:50:36.351Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20maven%20repository%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Maven Repository Server Plugin 1.10 and earlier does not escape the versions of build artifacts on the Build Artifacts As Maven Repository page, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to control maven project versions in `pom.xml`.
